
snap(30,0,0)
sky(255,255,255)
fog(255,160,100)
ground(130,85,45)
fadefrom(5000)
nlaps(2)
pulsegrnd(1.15,0.15,0.1)
lava(15)
desc(0,The floor is lava! Your car gets damaged during every moment)
desc(1,spent touching the stage floor.)
desc(3,Also, I fixed the halfpipes.)
soundtrack(comeasyouare,270,53)

set(47,0,0,0)p
chk(40,0,2800,0)
set(13,-1520,5630,30)p
